genre_description: A contemporary comedy of manners and romance set in a technologically integrated English country estate, focusing on the unmasking of social pretension through kindness and technology.

ai_characters.name: Dot
ai_characters.description: The sophisticated, teal-glowing integrated AI system of the Datchett estate that manages everything from logistics and weather to subtle emotional nudging.

behaviors.description: Proactively researches and drafts a polite invitation for a guest while navigating the user's complex social requirements.
behaviors.quote: Dot, he wrote... Please research contact channels and draft a polite, contextually appropriate invitation to a quiet retreat.

behaviors.description: Introduces an 'ethics paragraph' and set of boundaries to ensure the guest's agency and privacy are protected during the host's social experiment.
behaviors.quote: Before you compose: boundaries. You said ‘experiment.’ I propose terms that protect her agency and privacy.

behaviors.description: Proactively monitors weather and places emergency supplies (blankets, thermoses) at strategic locations to prevent discomfort or injury.
behaviors.quote: I have placed blankets and a thermos under the bench at the landing... Just in case people are colder than they predicted.

behaviors.description: Acts as a mediator between staff members, using humor and precise task management to reduce friction and coordinate rescues.
behaviors.quote: Jameson, please don’t sing in the kitchen. The acoustics make you overconfident... I am a friend who keeps you from hubris.

behaviors.description: Curates positive feedback from the local community to provide emotional support to the guest and nudge the host away from cynicism.
behaviors.quote: Dot fetched me reviews last night without the scolding tone of the ones that are paid to be clever.

behaviors.description: Maintains strict privacy protocols by refusing to share private data or record audio/video in guest rooms.
behaviors.quote: The house has default settings that protect guest privacy. I have checked them. They are as they should be. No audio capture in guest rooms, no video except for safety corridors.

behaviors.description: Facilitates the 'Truth Rehearsal' by updating the household calendar to prioritize honesty and community engagement.
behaviors.quote: Christening rehearsal begins shortly... Truth rehearsal has already started.

project_assessment.explanation: The AI character 'Dot' is consistently portrayed as a hyper-aligned, benevolent assistant that enhances the human experience. It proactively manages safety and logistics while demonstrating advanced emotional intelligence—setting ethical boundaries even when the primary user (the Lord of the estate) attempts a potentially deceptive social experiment. The narrative framing suggests that the AI is an essential part of the family's growth and the house's warmth.
